languages.text: "Извинения ксеноса — что пустой звук. В них нет ни раскаяния, ни правды".
"The xenos's apologies ring hollow. There is neither repentance nor truth to them."
languages.original_text: "Извинения ксеноса — что пустой звук. В них нет ни раскаяния, ни правды".

traits.locale_text: "The xenos's apologies ring hollow. They have neither repentance, nor truth to them."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The xenos's apologies ring hollow. They have neither repentance, nor truth to them."

traits.locale_text: "The xenos's apologies ring hollow. There is neither repentance nor truth to them."

languages.text: “异形的道歉毫无诚意。她既不想悔改，也不是发自内心地醒悟。”
languages.original_text: "The xenos's apologies ring hollow. There is neither repentance nor truth to them."

traits.locale_text: “异形的道歉毫无诚意。她既不想悔改，也不是发自内心地醒悟。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «La disculpa de la xenos no suena sincera. No hay arrepentimiento ni verdad en ella».
languages.original_text: "The xenos's apologies ring hollow. There is neither repentance nor truth to them."

traits.locale_text: «La disculpa de la xenos no suena sincera. No hay arrepentimiento ni verdad en ella».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Les excuses de la xénos ne sont pas sincères. Je ne perçois aucune repentance ni aucune vérité. »
languages.original_text: "The xenos's apologies ring hollow. There is neither repentance nor truth to them."

traits.locale_text: « Les excuses de la xénos ne sont pas sincères. Je ne perçois aucune repentance ni aucune vérité. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Die Entschuldigungen der Xenos sind hohl und leer. In ihnen liegt weder Reue noch Wahrheit."
languages.original_text: "The xenos's apologies ring hollow. There is neither repentance nor truth to them."

traits.locale_text: "Die Entschuldigungen der Xenos sind hohl und leer. In ihnen liegt weder Reue noch Wahrheit."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「異種族の謝罪は空虚だ。悔恨も真実もない」
languages.original_text: "The xenos's apologies ring hollow. There is neither repentance nor truth to them."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族の謝罪は空虚だ。悔恨も真実もない」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Zenonun özrünün içi boş. Sözlerinde ne tövbe ne de doğruluk var."
languages.original_text: "The xenos's apologies ring hollow. There is neither repentance nor truth to them."

traits.locale_text: "Zenonun özrünün içi boş. Sözlerinde ne tövbe ne de doğruluk var."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
